Medicine_507_p$Medicine_tweet_213_p$Medi.text:
Finding A: Seals gradually became more buoyant as they increased their fat stores while foraging over the course of the migration.
Finding B: The overweight and obese sample here reported a stronger desire to eat following priming with a series of television advertisements for food products than when primed with advertisements for non-food products.
Finding C: Given evidence for more pronounced MSDP-offspring smoking links in daughters (12-14, 16,17,19,24) and for sex differences in prenatal glucocorticoid levels (59) and offspring outcomes after prenatal glucocorticoid exposure (60), we also hypothesized that links between prenatal glucocorticoids and offspring ND would be stronger for daughters.
Finding D: Tamulosin is often used in patients with kidney stones in the hope it will speed stone passage. This RCT shows it is ineffective.

Finding A: Seals gradually became more buoyant as they increased their fat stores while foraging over the course of the migration.
Finding B: The overweight and obese sample here reported a stronger desire to eat following priming with a series of television advertisements for food products than when primed with advertisements for non-food products.
Finding C: Given evidence for more pronounced MSDP-offspring smoking links in daughters (12-14, 16,17,19,24) and for sex differences in prenatal glucocorticoid levels (59) and offspring outcomes after prenatal glucocorticoid exposure (60), we also hypothesized that links between prenatal glucocorticoids and offspring ND would be stronger for daughters.

Finding A: Most (n = 427 [60.6%]) of the 704 patients undergoing day surgery reported sufficient FHL, 223 (31.7%) reported problematic FHL, and 54 (7.7%) reported inadequate FHL.

Finding C: In our study, higher ANO7 mRNA expression strongly correlated with poor overall survival in PrCa patients.
Finding D: Conclusions/interpretation This nationwide retrospective cohort study found a positive correlation between type 1 diabetes and EV infection.
